title: Finally, Apple's Magic Keyboard, Trackpad, and Mouse No Longer Need Batteries
text:
Finally, Apple's Magic Keyboard, Trackpad, and Mouse No Longer Need Batteries 
Published By: Gizmodo.com - Today 
Apple’s wireless accessories for its iMac line got a much-needed update today alongside the new desktops themselves. Sure—the new 21.5-i...
